name: BionicBlitz (itch)
description:
Navigate your way through twelve unique levels, using epic power-ups to battle against an array of unique and formidable enemies.  Skill, tactics and strategy will be

required to finish each level as fast as you can in order to claim the ultimate prize of a first place score on the worldwide leaderboards.  Do you have what it takes?

Key Features

- Various unlockable power-ups to help overcome an onslaught of attacking enemies.  

- Unique and powerful enemies to keep you on your toes.  They will beat you in an instant if you are not careful!

- Four awesome arenas, each with their own unique theme.

- Four worldwide leaderboards, one for each arena.  Become a master by achieving the highest score in each leaderboard!
